dao.name: QRY_HFD_ORDER_CONFIRM_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, confirm_cod, subject, content, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hfd_order_confirm_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and hotel_cod = :hotel_cod

dao.name: QRY_HFD_ORDER_CONFIRM_RF_USE_COD
dao.statement: select use_cod,use_nam from email_use_rf where athena_id = ? and hotel_cod = ? and use_sta = 'Y'
